title: Suncor expects Enbridge Line 9B to start up towards end of Q2 2015

content: TORONTO  Jan 21 Canada's main stock index rallied on Wednesday after the central bank cut its benchmark rate in a shock move  helping boost shares of energy companies as well as interest-sensitive banks and other financial issues.
name: Enbridge Inc
title: CANADA STOCKS-Shock Bank of Canada rate cut boosts TSX  banks climb

content: WILLISTON  N.D.  Jan 1 An Enbridge Inc  crude oil storage and pipeline facility just south of Williston  N.D.  has caught fire  eyewitnesses said.
name: Enbridge Inc
title: Enbridge oil facility in North Dakota catches fire; damage unclear
